title: Forcepoint Security Service Edge - Cloud Logs
description: This dashboard provides detailed insights into the cloud audit logs and cloud activity summaries from Forcepoint Security Service Edge, including file scanning results, file status, user details, and more.

definition.content:
**Dashboard Overview**

This dashboard provides detailed insights into the cloud audit logs and cloud activity summaries from Forcepoint Security Service Edge, including file scanning results, file status, user details, and more.

For more information, see the [Forcepoint Security Service Edge Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/forcepoint_security_service_edge/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Top List of Actors and IP Address
